name: Five Nights At Foddy's
description:
Five Nights at Foddy's is a fan-made game where you find yourself in an abandoned hospital and must get out at all costs!

Developers:

KanEgora - code, art, voice.

egorela12 - story, voice.

egorchik13 - story, concert arts,voice.

MihaBoom - art, voice.

Special Thanks:

DChelStudio - help with engine, comics.
